thread.title: Ground News - My brother is a World Cup champion - I quit football for a different career
thread.title_full: Ground News - My brother is a World Cup champion - I quit football for a different career

author: The Sun
title: Ground News - My brother is a World Cup champion - I quit football for a different career
text:
Summary by The Sun ROMAIN GIROUD ditched football as a youngster to pursue a completely different career – now he takes inspiration from his World Cup -winning brother. The 46-year-old, who is the brother of AC Milan striker Olivier Giroud, played for Auxerre and represented France at Under-15 and Under-17 level as a centre-back. Romain Giroud, brother of Olivier Giroud, gave up football for a different job GettyOlivier Giroud currently plays for AC Milan[/caption]… Share menu More
